item.description:
Lets raise money to keep our group running! Lots of raffle prizes and mingling with our local surfers and sup'ers.

Out meetup.com groups are a great place to meet other local surfers and SUP'ers, find a surf buddy, exchange stories, and brag about waves. The group is free to join, but meetup.com charges a fee to maintain the group. This event is a fun way to raise funds to secure our fees to keep the group running. Please join us at JJ Foley's to drink and have fun, socialize, and win some cool raffle items!

$2.00 PBR Drink specials

And a very special thanks to our sponsors for donating items to our raffle (more to be added):

Bern: http://www.bernunlimited.com/
Bern specializes in action sport head protection, pads and apparel for the skateboard, ski, snowboard, bike, kayak and wakeboard community.

PaddleBoard NewEngland:
https://www.facebook.com/PaddleBoardNewEngland
Located in Beverly, MA right on the water

Luminate Surf and Skate:
http://luminatesurfandskate.com/
Located in Marshfield, MA

Rowing & Paddling For All
Little Harbor Boathouse, 40 Doaks Ln., Little Harbor, Marblehead.
http://rowingforall.com

Zapstix Surf Shop
Ocean Blvd., in Seabrook, NH. Right on Seabrook Beach - rentals and lessons all summer long.
http://www.zapstixsurf.com

Cinnamon Rainbows Surf Shop
Ocean Blvd., in Hampton NH. Located right at the wall, across from the bath house.
http://www.cinnamonrainbows.com

Pioneers Surf Shop
62 Lafayette Rd (Rt 1) in North Hampton.
Surf, Skate, and Snow
http://www.surfnh.com

Maui Jim Sunglasses
www.mauijim.com

Wavzcap
http://www.wavzcap.com/

Rock'n entertainment
Donated a Chino Surfboards Gift Certificate for $100.
Will be in the raffle on sunday!
http://www.rocknentertainment.com/wordpress/?page_id=323
item.name: Surf and SUP fundraising raffle for our meetup group
